Title: Panning Tile Control for Windows Phone 7
Description: The panning tile control mimics the functionality of the Windows Phone 7 music tile: Photos and text slowly pan, scroll and fade. It can be used inside of any WP7 Silverlight app.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The panning tile control mimics the functionality of the Windows Phone 7 music tile: Photos and text slowly pan, scroll and fade. It can be used inside of any WP7 Silverlight app.

The control exposes properties that allow developers to change the behavior of the control, including:
  • Mulitple animation directions (left, right, up, down, zoom)
  • Duration of animations
  • Text for scrolling marque
